seo_keywords: Shark Stratos brush roll red light

problems.title: Bad Smell / Cartridge Empty
problems.description: Vacuum smells or the odor dial is on max but no scent.
solution_steps: Check the dial on the floor nozzle.

problems.title: Nozzle Light Red
solution_steps: Clean the soft roller and rear fins.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Stratos Upright Vacuum (AZ3002)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $548 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Stratos Upright Vacuum (AZ3002) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Stratos Upright Vacuum (AZ3002) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
